text:
Meguru, you seem even more cheerful lately.
Did something good happen?

Yeah! I'm super excited because our
idol activities are starting soon...!

And also, having friends I can work
hard with makes me really happy...!
Haha, if you feel that way, I'm happy too.

Hehe!
When I saw you two, I just knew it!

I believe that with the three of us, something wonderful
is bound to happen! That's why I want us to become closer.

Yeah, trust is important to become a great unit.
But I feel like we'll get along just fine, Meguru.

Thank you! Yeah, you're right.
Cooperation is important in sports too...!

All right! I'll give it my all,
so watch me, Producer!
